text: Transhumanism is a cultural movement that thinks that humans could benefit from technology (mostly the biological type) that improves the condition of life. It seeks to find a solution to aging, disease, and death (especially of the natural variety) by making use of such technology. The word was coined by Julian Huxley in 1957. == References == == Other websites == * What is Transhumanism? Category:Philosophical anthropology
title: Transhumanism
